text: Acunüng, Johan khawkhyawng khawa ngdang law lü, baptican jah pe law lü, jah mtheimthang law lü,1:4 Johan khawkhyawng khawa ngdang law lü, baptican jah pe law lü, jah mtheimthang law lü ft ti cun avang üng Johan khawkhyawng khawa ngdang law lü, jah mtheimthang law lü tia ng'yuki.  “Nami katnak nghlata u lü Baptican khan ua, Pamhnam naw nami katnak he ning jah mhlät khai ni,” a ti.
